sen.j: 精華くるりんバス（せいか -）は、京都府相楽郡精華町で運行しているコミュニティバス。
sen.e: Seika Kururin Bus is a community bus operated in Seika-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 略称「せいかー」のカッコ書きについては訳を省略しました。
sen.e: Seika Kururin Bus is a community bus operated in Seika-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
Seika Kururin Bus is a community bus operated in Seika-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: エヌシーバス郡山営業所に運行委託していたが、2007年11月1日より奈良交通平城営業所に移管された。
sen.e: The operation had been entrusted to NC Bus before, but has been transferred to Heijo Transportation Office of Nara Kotsu on November 1, 2007.
The operation had been entrusted to NC Bus before, but has been transferred to Heijo Transportation Office of Nara Kotsu on November 1, 2007.
The operation had been entrusted to NC Bus before, but has been transferred to Heijo Transportation Office of Nara Kotsu on November 1, 2007.

sen.j: 2005年3月3日から運行を開始した。
sen.e: The operation has started on March 3, 2005.
The operation has started on March 3, 2005.
The operation has started on March 3, 2005.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: バスボディは特別なものではなく、奈良交通バスの正面に幕を、横の広告欄に表示をそれぞれ掲示している。
sen.e: The bus vehicle body is not special, a bus of Nara Kotsu Bus with a banner in front and a notice in the side advertisement space.
The bus vehicle body is not special, a bus of Nara Kotsu Bus with a banner in front and a notice in the side advertisement space.
The bus vehicle body is not special, a bus of Nara Kotsu Bus with a banner in front and a notice in the side advertisement space.

sen.j: 運賃は一律100円で、身体障害者や生徒・児童に関する割引は無い。
sen.e: The fare is a flat rate of 100 yen, and there is no discount for the physically disabled, students or children.
The fare is a flat rate of 100 yen, and there is no discount for the physically disabled, students or children.
The fare is a flat rate of 100 yen, and there is no discount for the physically disabled, students or children.

sen.j: 但し未就学児は無料。
sen.e: However, preschool children are free of charge.
However, preschool children are free of charge.
However, preschool children are free of charge.

sen.j: CI-CAは利用できないが、専用回数券が奈良交通に移管された2007年11月1日より販売され、利用可能となった。
sen.e: The CI-CA card is not available, but the coupon tickets of Nara Kotsu Bus have been available since November 1, 2007 when the operation was transferred to Nara Kotsu Bus.
The CI-CA card is not available, but the coupon tickets of Nara Kotsu Bus have been available since November 1, 2007 when the operation was transferred to Nara Kotsu Bus.
The CI-CA card is not available, but the coupon tickets of Nara Kotsu Bus have been available since November 1, 2007 when the operation was transferred to Nara Kotsu Bus.

sen.j: 隣接する木津川市のきのつバスと違い、既存の奈良交通の路線バスとは異なる路線が設定されており、停留所名も既存停留所と同一の場所であっても異なる名称を採用していることも多い。
sen.e: Different from Kinotsu Bus of neighboring Kizugawa City, this bus line takes different routes from the existing routes of the Nara Kotsu route bus, and often uses different bus stop names from the existing stops even if they are located in the same places.

Different from Kinotsu Bus of neighboring Kizugawa City, this bus line takes different routes from the existing routes of the Nara Kotsu route bus, and often uses different bus stop names from the existing stops even if they are located in the same places.

Different from Kinotsu Bus of neighboring Kizugawa City, this bus line takes different routes from the existing routes of the Nara Kotsu route bus, and often uses different bus stop names from the existing stops even if they are located in the same places.

sen.j: また、「万代 (チェーンストア)前」「ユータウンけいはんな・コーナン前」など、近辺の民間商業施設名を停留所名に採用するなど、公営コミュニティバスとしては柔軟な対応が見られる。
sen.e: This bus seems more flexible than the other public community buses, as they use private or commercial facilities' names for the bus stop names, such as "Mandai" (chain store) and "U-Town Keihanna/Kohnan".

This bus seems more flexible than the other public community buses, as they use private or commercial facilities' names for the bus stop names, such as 'Mandai' (a chain store) and 'U-Town Keihanna/Kohnan.'
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。a 補足しました。ピリオドの位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: This bus seems more flexible than the other public community buses, as they use private or commercial facilities' names for the bus stop names, such as 'Mandai' (a chain store) and 'U-Town Keihanna/Kohnan.'

sen.j: コミュニティバスとしては珍しく、車外広告を募集している。
sen.e: The bus line invites on-vehicle advertisements, although this is not often the case with community bus.
The bus line invites on-vehicle advertisements, although this is not often the case with community bus.
The bus line invites on-vehicle advertisements, although this is not often the case with community bus.

sen.j: また沿線の催し物を車内案内するなど、独自のサービスを行っている。
sen.e: They offer original services, such as providing in-vehicle announcement on the events that are held along the line.
They offer original services, such as providing in-vehicle announcement on the events that are held along the route.
They offer original services, such as providing in-vehicle announcement on the events that are held along the route.

sen.j: 沿線にはニュータウン及び関西文化学術研究都市（精華・西木津地区）が控える。
sen.e: Along the bus route are New Town and Kansai Science City (Seika・Nishi Kizu Area).
Along the bus route, there are New Town and Kansai Science City (Seika/Nishi Kizu Area).
sen.cmt: , there 補足しました。/補足しました。
sen.e: Along the bus route, there are New Town and Kansai Science City (Seika/Nishi Kizu Area).

sen.j: 多くの区間で奈良交通の路線が並行して走るものの、奈良交通より運賃が安いこともあって、町民からはくるりんバス増便を求める声が高い。
sen.e: Although the Kururin Bus routes overlap with those of Nara Kotsu Bus in many sections, the townspeople call for the more frequent bus services as the Kurusin Bus fare is cheaper.
Although the Kururin Bus routes overlap with those of Nara Kotsu Bus in many sections, the townspeople call for the more frequent bus services due to the Kurusin Bus fare is cheaper.
sen.cmt: asをdue to に訂正しました。
sen.e: Although the Kururin Bus routes overlap with those of Nara Kotsu Bus in many sections, the townspeople call for the more frequent bus services due to the Kurusin Bus fare is cheaper.

sen.j: 2005年3月3日より運行が開始された
sen.e: The operation has started since March 3, 2005.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The operation has started since March 3, 2005.
The operation has started since March 3, 2005.

sen.j: 最初の4ヶ月間は試験運転として無料運行がされ、2005年7月1日より正式運行に伴い一律100円の運賃となった。
sen.e: During test operation for the first four months the fare was free, and since July 1, 2005 when the official operation has started, the fare has been fixed to 100 yen.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: During test operation for the first four months the fare was free, and since July 1, 2005 when the official operation has started, the fare has been fixed to 100 yen.
During test operation for the first four months the fare was free, and since July 1, 2005 when the official operation has started, the fare has been fixed to 100 yen.

sen.j: 祝園駅～役場・図書館～ユータウンけいはんな・コーナン前～国立国会図書館関西館～けいはんなプラザ～東畑口～光台～精華町立精華南中学校～山田川駅

sen.cmt: 停留所間の「～」について、処置が不明のため「半角スペース・ハイフン半角スペース」としました。
sen.e: Hosono Station - Town Office/Library - U-Town Keihanna/Kohnan - Kansai-kan of the National Diet Library - Keihanna Plaza - Higashihataguchi - Hikaridai - Seika Town Seikaminami Junior High School - Yamadagawa Station

sen.j: 祝園駅→菅井→祝園駅東（近鉄新祝園駅）→むくのきセンター→南京都高等学校→花空間けいはんな→狛田駅・下狛駅→いちご園→祝園駅
sen.e: Hosono Station - Sugai - Hosono Station East (Kintetsu Shin-Housono Station) - Mukunoki Center - Minami-Kyoto High School - Gardening Space in Kyoto - Komada Station/Shimokoma Station - Strawberry Field - Hosono Station
